description:
Wisdom of Solomon, Sirach, Tobit, Maccabees, ect, all LXX books either quoted or alluded to in the GNT appear to be missing from the loading of LXX books in this app, hopeful these may be included in future versions! 
This app would be the premier app for Orthodox students if this was possible!
Thankyou!
summary: does not appear to have the full LXX?
